text: "In Love with a Girl" is the #1 single by Gavin DeGraw on the album Gavin DeGraw. In Love with a Girl was released February 2008. ==Charts== Chart (2008) Peak position Belgium (Ultratip Flanders) 17 Canadian Hot 100 32 Danish Singles Chart 24 Italian Download Singles Chart 41 Japan Hot 100 21 Netherlands (Single Top 100) 40 Swiss Singles Chart 73 US Billboard Hot 100 24 US Billboard Pop Songs 10 US Billboard Adult Pop Songs 5 ==References== Category:2008 songs
title: In Love with a Girl (song)
